CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: I SD = ( W / 2L)C i μ(V G - V T ) Photovoltaic Properties.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| W |
| L |
| C |
| μ |
| V G |
| V T |

Note:

* W: Width
* L: Length
* C: Conductivity
* μ: Mobility
* V G: Open-circuit voltage
* V T: Short-circuit current

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Valid entities:
| Material Name |
| --- |
| C |
| μ |

Note:

* C: Conductivity
* μ: Mobility

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: I SD = ( W / 2L)C i μ(V G - V T ) Photovoltaic Properties.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| SD |
| W |
| L |
| C |
| μ |
| V G |
| V T |

Note: The entities in the paragraph can be recognized as:

* SD: System efficiency
* W: Width
* L: Length
* C: Conversion efficiency
* μ: Fill factor
* V G: Generator voltage
* V T: Threshold voltage

All these entities are related to the photovoltaic properties of a solar cell.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| C |
| μ |
| V G |
| V T |

Note:

* C: Conversion efficiency (a measure of the efficiency of a solar cell in converting sunlight into electrical energy)
* μ: Fill factor (a measure of the efficiency of a solar cell in filling the solar radiation)
* V G: Generator voltage (the voltage generated by a solar cell)
* V T: Threshold voltage (the minimum voltage required to operate a solar cell)

These four entities clearly refer to material properties of a solar cell.
